scripts.preuninstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const os = require('os'); const binaryPath = path.join(os.homedir(), '.config', 'manicode', process.platform === 'win32' ? 'codebuff.exe' : 'codebuff'); try { fs.unlinkSync(binaryPath) } catch (e) { /* ignore if file doesn't exist */ }"
